# Contributing to Hostel Allocation System

Thank you for your interest in contributing! Please follow these guidelines:

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/ITpatrick1/hostel-allocation.git`
3. Create a feature branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name`
4. Install dependencies: `npm install`

## Development

- Run development server: `npm run dev`
- Run tests: `npm test`
- Run linting: `npm run lint`

## Submitting Changes

1. Make your changes and commit with clear messages
2. Push to your fork
3. Create a Pull Request with a description of changes
4. Ensure all CI checks pass

## Code Style

- Use ESLint for linting
- Follow existing code patterns
- Add tests for new features
